events.message: The applicant has submitted a personal loan application for medical expenses related to surgery and recovery costs.
The loan application was categorized under Personal Loan due to the mention of medical expenses in the request.
A loan officer was assigned to the case to assist the applicant with the processing of the personal loan for medical bills.
Initial review of the loan application found that the applicant's documents need to be verified for completeness and accuracy.
Requested medical bills, proof of income, and identification documents to proceed with the application process.
Applicant submitted all requested documents including hospital bills and recent pay stubs as proof of steady income.
Credit check was completed, showing a good credit score with no recent delinquencies or defaults.
Risk assessment concluded that the applicant has a moderate risk level with stable income and reasonable debt-to-income ratio.
Loan offer was presented to the applicant with competitive interest rates and flexible repayment options tailored to medical needs.
The applicant responded positively to the loan offer, expressing satisfaction with the terms and conditions proposed.
The personal loan for medical expenses was approved after successful verification and applicant agreement to terms.
Funds for the approved personal loan were disbursed to the applicant's bank account to cover medical expenses urgently.
Follow-up call was made to ensure the applicant received the funds and to answer any questions about repayment schedules.
The loan application case was successfully closed after all disbursements and follow-ups were completed to satisfaction.
